metas.description: The full race card for the Albert Bartlett Novices Hurdle will include the betting and form for each runner.

page.content:
Albert Bartlett Novices Hurdle Race Card 2013

The Albert Bartlett Novices Hurdle is the 3 mile race for the novice hurdlers and it is always an excellent renewal from a betting point of view on the final day of the Cheltenham Festival. The race card will be fully comprehensive and will include details and form for each of the runners in the field as well as how to place a bet on them. Connections will be detailed as well as the number of each runner and the jockey booking.

Albert Bartlett Novices Hurdle Card
